projects.name: LetMeAsk
projects.description: Project created for the class CS 394. The point of this project was to create an application where students could ask questions directly to the author's of textbooks.
projects.contributors: Brian Sui, Zhuping Yu, Patrice Powers, Jordan Zax, Andrew Courtner, Zev Stravitz

projects.name: TaskFull
projects.description: Project created fo rthe class CS 394. This web app was created to help people in need with tasks that were too cumbersome to overcome, by having other people help the user.
projects.contributors: Brian Sui, Zhuping Yu, Patrice Powers, Jordan Zax, Andrew Courtner, Zev Stravitz

projects.name: AllRecipes-NLP
projects.description: A Natural Language Processing project for the class CS 337. The point of this application was to adapt recipes by handling prompts from user inputs.

projects.name: Retrieving Awards
projects.description: A Natural Language Processing project for the class CS 337. This project skimmed through tweets to find award names and winners for the Academy Awards by being trained with previous years' tweets.

projects.name: MeetMeNative
projects.description: An application created for the class CS 397. Designed to help busy people meet with their friends at their own accords.
projects.contributors: Bradley Ramos, Danyil Pysmak, Terry Tan

projects.name: Localert
projects.description: Designed for the ITC Hackathon 2019, this was an app where people could alert other pedestrians for any kind of disturbance.
projects.contributors: Elroi Luria, Igor Sved, Julia Hania, Rotem Sapir

projects.name: Tagalong
projects.description: An application created to help people in groups safely travel to different locations.
projects.contributors: Kieran Bondy, Adnan Can Turkay, Bradley Ramos, Ka Wong

projects.name: NUPay
projects.description: A web page created for the class CS 330. The point of the app was to create a prototype of Venmo where you could just send money to other people by touching phones.
projects.contributors: Deokcelmo Filho, Danyil Pysmak, Ishaan Madan

projects.name: hymn
projects.description: A startup that was built to give music suggestions and music ratings, with the intent of becoming an internet music database.
projects.contributors: Cem Unuvar, Adnan Can Turkay, Alp Kismir

projects.name: Hearo
projects.used_technologies: React Native, Voximplant API, Google Speech-to-Text API, Twilio API
projects.description: An application that let you transcribe voice calls made inside of this application.
